Package epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.connection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionInterface
    The interface that a connection or a connection worker must implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingConnection
    Encapsulates a blocking connection that blocks over a readLine()-call
    IOConnection
    Encapsulates a connection opened.
    PipelinedConnection
    Encapsulates a pipelined-connection that allow pipelined requests performing
    PriorityWaitingRequestQueue<T extends Request>
    This class sort the request to send in order to ensure the correct order of the answer
